attributes.action: pass a legislation to ensure that all riders of motorcycles/scooters/mopeds of any engine capacity are required to pass a Driving Theory test before using public roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Legislation required to ensure that all users of motorised vehicles have basic road knowledge and road sense before endangering the public.  A large number of young moped/scooter riders are being allowed to use public roads with little or no awareness of the dangers they can cause and face themselves.
